rooms.description: Spacious living room with built-in shelves and a central seating arrangement.
Well-equipped kitchen integrated with dining area. Adheres to Vastu principles by placing the main entrance in the North-East corner.
Primary master bedroom with a balcony facing the West for privacy and natural light, ensuring optimal Vastu orientation.
Second bedroom with a balcony for ventilation and sunlight, ensuring balanced energy flow as per Vastu.
Additional bedroom with a balcony to enhance air circulation and natural lighting. Vastu balanced for energy positivity.
Fourth bedroom with a balcony facing the West for calm and restful ambiance as per Vastu principles.
Additional guest room ensuring energy balance within the home.

openings.description: Well-positioned entrance to harness positive energy as per Vastu principles.
Large window in the kitchen area for ample natural light and ventilation.
Dedicated balcony doors to connect each bedroom with its private outdoor space.
Roof windows installed for effective light distribution and ventilation in living areas.

dimensions.description: Traditional Kerala Nalukettu style home designed on a 100x100 feet plot with emphasis on Vastu alignment. The West-facing orientation of the plot has been considered to maximize natural cooling and ventilation.
